title: Injured Bulls, Potential Laker Trades
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Marc J. Spears and Kevin Pelton discuss the impact of injuries on the Bulls, if Detroit will trade Jerami Grant, if a Westbrook for Wall trade is possible and the Blazers' plan for the rest of the season.
